title: THIRD PERSON PC Build Challenge
description: Dont build a gaming PC in third person. First person is the best way to live life. Win a $500 Gift Card! PC Build Showcase Contest:  Browse the Build Showcase:  Austins Custom PC:  Austins Showcase Post:  Need Help Picking Your PC Parts?:   Browse Micro Centers work and learn from home products:  Micro Center Custom Build Service:   AMD Ryzen 5 3600:  ASUS B550M-PLUS TUF Gaming mATX Motherboard:  ASUS Radeon RX 5600 XT TUF Gaming Graphics Card:  Crucial Ballistix Gaming RGB 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR4-3200:  Crucial P2 500GB NVMe M.2 SSD:  Seagate BarraCuda 2TB Hard Drive:  PowerSpec 650 Watt 80 Plus Bronze Power Supply:  Fractal Design Define S2 Case:  ASUS ROG Strix LC 240mm RGB Water Cooling Kit:   My new podcast The Test Drivers!  Our second channel @thisis!  I stream on Twitch now!  We have a new Discord:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
